record.title: MAVEN Insitu Key Parameters Data Collection
record.creators: Jakosky, Bruce, M.; Luhmann, Janet, G.
record.description: A collection of MAVEN key parameters from the in situ instruments on MAVEN: NGIMS, EUV, LPW, MAG, SEP, STATIC, SWEA, and SWIA. Instrument data is derived directly from Level 2 data. Ephemeris information is derived using SPICE libraries and kernels provided by MAVEN/NAV team and Lockheed-Martin.
record.keywords: PDS; PDS4; Maven; Calibrated; Mars Atmosphere and Volatile EvolutioN Mission; MAVEN; Extreme Ultraviolet Monitor; Langmuir Probe and Waves Instrument; Magnetometer; Neutral Gas and Ion Mass Spectrometer; Solar Energetic Particle Experiment; Supra-Thermal and Thermal Ion Composition; Solar Wind Electron Analyzer; Solar Wind Ion Analyzer; Mars
